comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: One of our friends at the Archives Outside blog has some local knowledge of this area. Apparently "the milk bar advertising Peter’s Ice Cream on the corner of Church and Macquarie Streets was run, for a year or so, by John Goffage later known as actor ‘Chips’ Rafferty during the 1930s." adbonline.anu.edu.au/biogs/A140322b.htm

comment.author: 36196524@N08
comment._content: That's Murray Brothers store on the left.  Diagonally opposite, out of sight on the right of the photographer, was "Murrays Limited".  Part of that building is visible in the previous shot, of Parramatta Town Hall.
